detectors.description:

	External calls:
	- msg.sender.call.value(_am)() (0x730f8c40a08d02349a2d64e3193cf207a2a2dfe7.sol#22)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- acc.balance -= _am (0x730f8c40a08d02349a2d64e3193cf207a2a2dfe7.sol#24)
	PG_Bank.Acc (0x730f8c40a08d02349a2d64e3193cf207a2a2dfe7.sol#43) can be used in cross function reentrancies:
	- PG_Bank.Acc (0x730f8c40a08d02349a2d64e3193cf207a2a2dfe7.sol#43)
	- PG_Bank.Collect(uint256) (0x730f8c40a08d02349a2d64e3193cf207a2a2dfe7.sol#15-28)
	- PG_Bank.Put(uint256) (0x730f8c40a08d02349a2d64e3193cf207a2a2dfe7.sol#5-13)

detectors.description:
